00081 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_GACTABLE_H_LAQ
00082 #define CONSTRAINT_GACTABLE_H_LAQ
00083 
00084 template<typename VarArray>
00085 struct GACTableConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00086 {
00087   virtual string constraint_name()
00088   { return "TableDynamic"; }
00089   
00090   typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00091   VarArray vars;
00092   
00093 #ifdef BINARY_SEARCH
00094   int find_first_inconsistency(const vector<int>& v)
00095   {
00096     for(unsigned i = 0; i < v.size(); ++i)
00097     {
00098       if(!vars[i].inDomain(v[i]))
00099         return i;
00100     }
00101     return -1;
00102   }
00103   
00104   void setFirstValid(vector<int>& support)
00105   {
00106     for(int i = 0; i < support.size(); ++i)
00107       support[i] = vars[i].getMin();
00108   }
00109   
00110   int setNextValid(vector<int>& support, int var_considered, int first_broken_val)
00111   {
00112     for(int i = first_broken_val + 1; i < support.size(); ++i)
00113       support[i] = vars[i].getMin();
00114     
00115     for(int i = first_broken_val; i >= 0; --i)
00116     {
00117       if(i != var_considered)
00118       {
00119         int pos = std::max(support[i] + 1, vars[i].getMin());
00120         
00121         while(pos <= vars[i].getMax() && !vars[i].inDomain(pos))
00122           pos++;
00123 
00124         if(pos > vars[i].getMax())
00125           support[i] = vars[i].getMin();
00126         else
00127         {
00128           support[i] = pos;
00129           return i;
00130         }
00131       }
00132     }
00133     return -1;
00134   }
00135 #endif
00136   
00137   LiteralSpecificLists* lists;
00138   
00139   MemOffset _current_support;
00140   
00141   int* current_support()
00142   { return (int*)(_current_support.get_ptr()); }
00143   
00145   vector<int>& supporting_tuple(int i)
00146   { return (lists->literal_specific_tuples)[i][current_support()[i]]; }
00147   
00149   bool check_tuple(const vector<int>& v)
00150   {
00151     for(unsigned i = 0; i < v.size(); ++i)
00152     {
00153       if(!vars[i].inDomain(v[i]))
00154         return false;
00155     }
00156     return true;
00157   }
00158   
00159   
00160   GACTableConstraint(const VarArray& _vars, TupleList* _tuples) :
00161     vars(_vars), lists(_tuples->getLitLists())
00162   {
00163     if((int)_vars.size() != lists->tuples->tuple_size())
00164     {
00165       FAIL_EXIT("In table constraint, number of variables is not equal to length of tuples.");
00166     }
00167     _current_support.request_bytes(lists->tuples->literal_num * sizeof(int));
00168   }
00169   
00170   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00171   { return (lists->tuples->literal_num) * ( vars.size() - 1) ; }
00172   
00173 
00174   
00175   bool find_new_support(int literal, int var)
00176   {
00177     int support = current_support()[literal];
00178     vector<vector<int> >& tuples = (lists->literal_specific_tuples)[literal];
00179     int support_size = tuples.size();
00180     
00181     // These slightly nasty lines get us some nice raw pointers to the list of tuples.
00182     vector<int>* start_position = &*(tuples.begin());
00183     vector<int>* end_position = &*(tuples.begin()) + tuples.size();
00184 
00185     
00186 #ifdef BINARY_SEARCH
00187     vector<int> new_support_tuple(vars.size());
00188     setFirstValid(new_support_tuple);
00189     while(true)
00190     {
00191       vector<int>* new_pos = lower_bound(start_position, end_position, new_support_tuple);
00192       if(new_pos == end_position)
00193         return false;
00194       
00195       int problem_pos = find_first_inconsistency(*new_pos);
00196     
00197       if(problem_pos == -1)
00198       { // Found new support.
00199         current_support()[literal] = new_pos - start_position;
00200         return true;
00201       }
00202       
00203       new_support_tuple = *new_pos;
00204       if(setNextValid(new_support_tuple, var, problem_pos) == -1)
00205         return false;
00206     }
00207 #else        
00208     for(int i = support; i < support_size; ++i)
00209     {
00210       if(check_tuple(tuples[i]))
00211       {
00212         current_support()[literal] = i;
00213         return true;
00214       }
00215     }
00216     
00217   for(int i = 0; i < support; ++i)
00218     {
00219       if(check_tuple(tuples[i]))
00220       {
00221         current_support()[literal] = i;
00222         return true;
00223       }
00224     }
00225     
00226     return false;
00227 #endif
00228   }
00229 
00230   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* propagated_trig)
00231   {
00232     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(DynGACTable);
00233 
00234     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00235     int trigger_pos = propagated_trig - dt;
00236     int propagated_literal = trigger_pos / (vars.size() - 1);
00237 
00238     pair<int,int> varval = (lists->tuples->get_varval_from_literal)(propagated_literal);
00239     BOOL is_new_support = find_new_support(propagated_literal, varval.first);
00240     if(is_new_support)
00241     {
00242       setup_watches(varval.first, varval.second);
00243                 // better to just pass in varval.first and propagated_literal
00244                 // setup_watches does not need value and recomputes lit
00245     }
00246     else
00247     {
00248       vars[varval.first].removeFromDomain(varval.second);
00249     }
00250   }  
00251   
00252   void setup_watches(int var, int val)
00253   {
00254     int lit = (lists->tuples->get_literal)(var, val);
00255     vector<int>& support = supporting_tuple(lit);
00256 
00257     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00258     
00259     int vars_size = vars.size();
00260     dt += lit * (vars_size - 1);
00261     for(int v = 0; v < vars_size; ++v)
00262     {
00263       if(v != var)
00264       {
00265         vars[v].addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, support[v]);
00266         ++dt;
00267       }
00268     }
00269   }
00270   
00271   virtual void full_propagate()
00272   { 
00273     for(unsigned i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00274     {
00275       int dom_min = (lists->tuples->dom_smallest)[i];
00276       int dom_max = (lists->tuples->dom_smallest)[i] + (lists->tuples->dom_size)[i];
00277       vars[i].setMin(dom_min);
00278       vars[i].setMax(dom_max - 1);
00279       
00280       if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00281       
00282       for(int x = vars[i].getMin(); x <= vars[i].getMax(); ++x)
00283       {
00284         int literal = (lists->tuples->get_literal)(i, x);
00285         if((lists->literal_specific_tuples)[literal].empty())
00286         {
00287           vars[i].removeFromDomain(x);
00288         }
00289         else
00290         {
00291           current_support()[literal] = 0;
00292           BOOL is_new_support = find_new_support(literal, i);
00293           
00294           if(!is_new_support)
00295           {
00296             vars[i].removeFromDomain(x);
00297           }
00298           else
00299           { setup_watches(i, x); }
00300         }
00301       }
00302     }
00303   }
00304   
00305    virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00306   {
00307     for(int i = 0; i < (lists->tuples)->size(); ++i)
00308     {
00309         if( std::equal(v, v + v_size, (*lists->tuples)[i]) )
00310         return true;
00311     }
00312     return false;
00313   }
00314   
00315     virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00316   { 
00317     vector<AnyVarRef> anyvars;
00318     for(unsigned i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00319       anyvars.push_back(vars[i]);
00320     return anyvars;
00321   }
00322   
00323 };
00324 
00325 
00326 template<typename VarArray>
00327 AbstractConstraint*
00328 GACTableCon(const VarArray& vars, TupleList* tuples)
00329 { return new GACTableConstraint<VarArray>(vars, tuples); }
00330 
00331 #endif
